string.name: EntryAbility_desc
string.value: Monitors heart rate to detect stress

string.name: permission_heart_rate_reason
string.value: Used to monitor heart rate for stress detection

string.name: permission_activity_reason
string.value: Used to detect movement and distinguish exercise from stress

string.name: permission_location_reason
string.value: Used to check speed and determine if you are exercising

string.name: permission_background_reason
string.value: Required to continue stress monitoring when app is in background
